about-me.title: Tigran Sargsyan - About me
about-me.headerIntro: Passionate Software Developer with a strong focus on creating immersive and engaging experiences using Unity. Expertise in game mechanics, programming, and design principles. Proficient in C# and Unity, with a commitment to staying current with industry advancements. Experienced in developing various software applications across different domains, showcasing versatility as a developer. Effective team player with excellent communication skills, dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet user needs and exceed expectations.
about-me.aboutSubtitle: Check out some of my personal information
about-me.aboutText1: Hi there! My name is Tigran. I'm 27 years old and originally from Armenia, but currently residing in Villeurbanne, Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes, France. I specialize in Unity game development and have experience working as a freelancer and in various companies. I hold a Master's degree in Information Technology, as well as a Master's degree in Diplomacy and hold a Bachelor's degree in Units Management.
about-me.aboutText2: Alongside being a passionate Unity game developer, particularly focused on gameplay programming, I enjoy discussing, designing, and developing applications and games in general.
about-me.aboutText3a: I've worked on a variety of
about-me.aboutText3b: , both for release, for showcasing Unity capabilities, and for experimental purposes, as well as
about-me.aboutText3c: where I've found certain technological stacks appealing. Currently, I'm working as a solo game developer.

about-me.hobbyCinemaText2: Also enjoy series such as Breaking Bad, Sherlock, Mr. Robot, Suits, Better Call Saul, 9-1-1, Rick and Morty, House, and much more.üì∫
